snippet: The United States attorney’s office said John G. Rowland, a Republican who served as governor of Connecticut from 1995 to 2004 and as a congressman from 1985 to 1991, would be arraigned on Friday afternoon.
lead_paragraph: The United States attorney’s office said John G. Rowland, a Republican who served as governor of Connecticut from 1995 to 2004 and as a congressman from 1985 to 1991, would be arraigned on Friday afternoon.
